text: Artemije Radosavljević (; 15 January 193521 November 2020) was a Serbian Orthodox bishop. He was the head of the Eparchy of Raška and Prizren from 1991 until 2010.Večernje novosti (29 May 2015). "Artemije o isključenju iz Crkve: Nisam iznenađen odlukom Sabora" . Bishop Artemije was born as Marko Radosavljević in the village of Lelić Artemije died on 21 November 2020 from COVID-19 in Valjevo, Serbia at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Serbia Category:Serbian Orthodox priests Category:Eastern Orthodox bishops
title: Artemije Radosavljević
